data.message: People are forgetting Em has made fun of numerous presidents that were in office, from Bush to Clinton, and was never afraid to speak his mind on it. If you are/were a fan, you'd know this is nothing new.

replies.message: he didn,t meantioned anything about the Us messing up around the world. I mean those 7 wars, or maybe more to this moment. But he is trying to put attention of his funs for other things like we don,t like the results of elections. a huge dissapointment
Olia Devos i cant even read this comment XD
Yeah! This time it's not in a tongue-in-cheek manner like he did with previous presidents, but I'm just glad he's back to making rhymes. 😁
But he's never said you need to chose a side...until now. Yet he had no problem with Trump before..https://youtu.be/T4q0S_Js3E8
